name: Chillin' Outback (Skill Card)
skill_activation: At the start of the Duel, flip this card over.
skill_effect:
Once per turn, you can change 1 face-up "Koala" or "Kangaroo" monster's battle position.
"Koala" and "Kangaroo" monsters you control can attack while in face-up Defense Position.
If they do, apply their DEF for damage calculation.
